SELECT ph.id, ph.company_id, ph.create_date, ph.create_uid, ph.update_date, ph.update_uid FROM wec_role_permission rp left join wec_permission_higher ph on rp.permission_id = ph.id where rp.company_id = :companyId and ph.id <> ''
<#if roleIdList?? && roleIdList?size gt 0> AND rp.role_id in ( <#list roleIdList as id> '${id}' <#if id_has_next>,</#if> </#list> ) </#if>
